section.title: Overview
section.para: This module offers storage support for topos module using htable module.

section.title: &kamailio; Modules
section.para:
The following modules must be loaded before this module:
topos module - to bind to as a storage engine.
htable module - to bind to as a shm storage engine.

section.title: External Libraries or Applications
section.para: No libraries or applications must be installed before running &kamailio; with this module loaded.
